text: Of the 418 IA1 patients and the 343 IA2 patients who underwent LN dissection, only 8 and 13 were identified with one or more positive LNs (1.9% versus 3.8%, respectively).PLN dissection was performed in more than half of the literature cases of microinvasive LoE2+ adenocarcinoma identified by Bisseling et al.

Please be cautious to avoid including any content that might raise ethical concerns. : 与宫颈癌相关的内容，我将为您创建一个问题。 **问题**：在微浸润性LoE2+腺癌患者中，IA1和IA2阶段淋巴结阳性率有何差异？ : Of the 418 IA1 patients and the 343 IA2 patients who underwent LN dissection, only 8 and 13 were identified with one or more positive LNs (1.9% versus 3.8%, respectively).PLN dissection was performed in more than half of the literature cases of microinvasive LoE2+ adenocarcinoma identified by Bisseling et al. **如果text中内容跟宫颈癌无关，请回复'SKIP'** :
response: 根据研究数据，在微浸润性LoE2+腺癌患者中，IA1阶段和IA2阶段淋巴结阳性率存在显著差异。具体而言，在接受淋巴结切除术的418例IA1患者中，仅有1.9%（8例）显示淋巴结阳性，而在343例IA2患者中，该比例升高至3.8%（13例）。这表明随着肿瘤阶段的提高（从IA1到IA2），淋巴结阳性率有所增加。此差异可能与疾病的侵袭性及其对淋巴系统的影响相关，提示需要根据阶段评估淋巴结切除术的必要性和潜在风险。
